solution.text:
The correct answer is option (3), because
- Carcharodon is a cartilaginous fish which belongs to the class Chondrichthyes.
- Myxine is a jawless vertebrate that belongs to the class Cyclostomata.
- Clarias is a bony fish which belongs to the class Osteichthyes.
- Ichthyophis is a limbless animal which belongs to the class Amphibia.
Hence the correct matches are
A. Chondrichthyes - Carcharodon
B. Cyclostomata - Myxine
C. Osteichthyes - Clarias
D. Amphibia - Ichthyophis
